mapper.select: SELECT sp.spid, sp.spname, sp.spurl, sp.companyid FROM sys_picture AS sp WHERE sp.companyid=#{id}
select sc.* from sys_company sc left join rel_agt_company ac on sc.company_id = ac.company_id where ac.agt_id =#{id} and sc.company_state=0 and del_stuts=1
select * from sys_company where company_state=1 and del_stuts=1;
select * from sys_company where company_state=0 and del_stuts=1;

select c.company_id,c.company_name from sys_company c left join rel_agt_company ac on ac.company_id = c.company_id left join agt_user au on au.u_id = ac.agt_id where c.company_state=1 and au.roleId!=1

SELECT sc.company_id as id, sc.company_name as companyname, sc.company_phone as companyphone, sc.company_qq as qqnumber, sc.company_email as companyemail, akt.tname as edtype FROM sys_company AS sc LEFT JOIN sys_user_company AS uc on sc.company_id=uc.company_id LEFT JOIN sys_user AS su on su.user_id=uc.user_id LEFT JOIN rel_user_keyword AS ruk on ruk.sys_user_id=su.user_id LEFT JOIN ag_keyword AS ak ON ak.kw_id=ruk.keyword_id LEFT JOIN rel_kword_type AS rkt ON rkt.kwid=ak.kw_id LEFT JOIN ag_kw_type AS akt ON akt.tid=rkt.tyid where su.user_id=#{userId}

SELECT sc.company_id as id, sc.company_name as companyname, sc.company_address as companyaddress, sc.company_trade as companytrade, sc.company_person as companyperson, sc.company_phone as companyphone, sc.company_fax as companyfax, sc.company_address as companyaddress, sc.company_email as companyemail, sc.company_site as companysite, sc.company_business as companybusiness, sc.company_descibe as companydescribe FROM sys_company AS sc LEFT JOIN sys_user_company AS uc on sc.company_id=uc.company_id LEFT JOIN sys_user AS su on su.user_id=uc.user_id where su.user_id=#{userId}
